titles.title: Geriatrics Workforce and Caregiver Enhancement Act
Geriatrics Workforce and Caregiver Enhancement Act

To amend the Public Health Service Act to support geriatrics education and training to address the elder care workforce shortage, promote interdisciplinary team-based care, educate and engage family caregivers, and improve the quality of care delivered to older adults, and for other purposes.
Geriatrics Workforce and Caregiver Enhancement Act
